seo.pageTitle: You Can Sell Crypto Directly Within Your MetaMask Wallet
seo.pageDescription: You Can Sell Crypto and Swap Tokens Effortlessly at Competitive Rates Directly Within Your MetaMask Wallet

internal.content: {"name":"keywords","content":"sell crypto, sell ethereum, how to sell crypto for cash, sell crypto for cash"}

node.headline: From crypto to cash with MetaMask

childMarkdownRemark.html: Cash out your crypto securely from your wallet

internal.content: {"link":"","name":"browsers-supported","text":"Oh no! This browser isn't supported today.","description":"Here are the browsers we currently support..."}

childMarkdownRemark.html: Times vary per provider, and funds may take a few days to reflect in your cash account.

modules.title: Sell Crypto > How to sell on Mobile

childMarkdownRemark.html:
• Click the “Sell” option from the menu bar at the bottom
  • Select your region
  • Select cash account destination available in your location (example: bank account, debit card, or PayPal)
  • Enter the crypto amount you want to sell (example: 0.5 ETH)
  • Click “Get Quotes” to proceed, all quotes from the different available providers will be presented in real-time. Select one to continue (remember, the cheapest option is presented to you first).
  • Complete the transaction on the provider’s portal to sign up and link your cash account
  • Review the order summary in your MetaMask app and confirm the transaction to send crypto to your cash account through the provider.
  • Click on the progress notification to keep track of your order as it is processed.

node.headline: Transact safely with our global partners

modules.title: Sell Crypto > Transact safely with our global partners
Sell Crypto > How to sell on Portfolio

childMarkdownRemark.html:
• Connect your MetaMask wallet to portfolio.metamask.io and click the “Sell” tab to get started or click the “Buy&Sell” button on MetaMask Extension. 
  • Select your region
  • Select the token and network you want to sell from (example: ETH on Ethereum)
  • Select cash account destination available in your location (example.: bank account, PayPal balance, or debit card)
  • Enter the crypto amount you want to sell (example: 0.5 ETH)
  • Select one quote from aggregated real-time options to continue. You'll be securely redirected to the provider’s website to sign up and link your cash account, then directed back to MetaMask Portfolio.
  • Select “Send ETH to [Provider]” to send crypto from your wallet to your cash account.
  • Confirm the transaction in your MetaMask wallet.
  • Click on the “Sell” tab to keep track of your order as it is processed.

embed.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cR1XpfZOab0?&rel=0&sub_confirmation=1" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Easy and Direct Conversion: MetaMask’s Sell feature enables you to cash out your crypto to fiat currencies with just a few clicks, offering a streamlined experience with minimal intermediaries.
Integrated Buy and Sell Experience: With MetaMask, you can complete the crypto and cash cycle through one wallet. Many of the same vetted providers are used for both buying and selling, simplifying the process and reducing the need for multiple accounts.
Broad Selection of Vetted Providers: Benefit from a wide range of vetted providers, ensuring secure, competitive, and real-time options for converting your crypto to cash, tailored to your region and currency preferences.
Global Accessibility with Expansion Plans: Initially supporting over 20 different fiat currencies across multiple regions and ETH on Ethereum Mainnet, MetaMask is continuously expanding to include more regions and cryptocurrencies, making web3 accessible worldwide.
Mobile App Convenience: With MetaMask, you can sell crypto on the go directly from your phone. We aggregate quotes from trusted providers for a seamless transition from crypto to cash, including options like bank accounts, debit cards, and PayPal balance.
